meaningMnemonic: If you want to <kanji>give</kanji> <kanji>clothes</kanji> to other people, you have to buy <vocabulary>draperies</vocabulary> first and then sew them together. That's a fancy word for <vocabulary>cloth</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
